#include <cstdio>
#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>
#include <cmath>
#include <cstring>
#include <cassert>
using namespace std;
#define p(x) cout<<#x<<":"<<x<<"\n"
#define lim 61
#define ll long long

ll x,y,i,j; 
ll C[lim][lim];

ll solve(ll i,ll j)
{
  ll &res=C[i][j];
  
  if(res==-1)
    if(!j || i==j)
	  res=1;
	else
	  res=solve(i-1,j-1)+solve(i-1,j);
  return res;
}
int main()
{
  cin>>x>>y;
  x=abs(x);
  y=abs(y);
  assert(x<=60);
  memset(C,-1,sizeof C);
  cout<<solve(x+y,x)<<"\n";
  return 0;
}
